item.title: How Do I Remove an Image System for Avd File in Android Studio
item.description: I want to remove the api 16 of jelly bean but there is not remove button how can I do that. image file is very big size file so I need don’t many system image file Go to Tools / Android / SDK Manager Tick Show package details in the bottom right. Untick the version(s) of Android you want to uninstall and click Ok. Android Studio 3.6.3 In version 3.6.3 File -> Settings -> Appearance & Behavior -> System Settings -> Android SDK

item.title: Android Studio emulator ugly black borders
item.description: Any way to remove the black box behind the emulator? Should run a compositor, something like compton Should try to use xprop WM_CLASS For the border, likely a compositor is needed or you can start the AVD without a device frame. For making it floating, add this to your config Floating all windows with “android emulator” header: for_window [title=".*Emulator.*"] floating enable
